question: Will a second union vote be approved by the NLRB at the Bessemer Amazon Warehouse before October 15, 2021?
description: This is a market on whether the National Labor Relations Board will approve a second union vote at the Amazon fulfillment center in Bessemer, Alabama before October 15, 2021. The board’s recommendation must overcome legal contests before the resolution date. This market will resolve to “Yes” if the NLRB permits, without an ongoing legal contest, the center’s workers to engage in a second union vote on or before October 14, 2021, 11:59:59 PM ET, and “No” otherwise. The resolution source for this market will be an official and uncontested board decision by the NLRB that permits a second union vote: (https://www.nlrb.gov/cases-decisions/decisions/board-decisions), (https://www.nlrb.gov/case/10-RC-269250).  In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

question: Will Donald Trump be President of the USA on November 30, 2021?
description:
This is a market on if Donald Trump will be President of the United States on November 30, 2021, 11:59 PM ET. This market will resolve to “Yes“ if, on the resolution date, Donald Trump is the current President of the United States, officially substantiated by official US government sources, like the links provided as the resolution source. If, for any reason, Donald Trump is not the sitting President of the United States on that date, this market will resolve to “No". The resolution sources are: 1. https://www.loc.gov/rr/print/list/057_chron.html, 2. https://history.house.gov/Institution/Presidents-Coinciding/Presidents-Coinciding/ and 3. https://www.whitehouse.gov/. 
 
If any of these 3 sources list Donald Trump officially as the current sitting president on the resolution date, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No." In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

question: Will Kanye West’s album DONDA be released by midnight ET, August 13, 2021?
description: This market will resolve to “Yes” if Kanye West’s album DONDA is available for download or streaming (not including live events) on Apple Music on or before August 13, 2021, 12:00:59 AM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No.” The resolution source for this market will be Kanye West’s official Apple Music page, https://music.apple.com/us/artist/kanye-west/2715720. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

question: How much ETH will be burned one month after EIP-1559 was implemented?
description:
This is a scalar market on the amount of ETH that will be burned from when EIP-1559 was implemented to September 5, 2021, 12:00 PM ET. The lower bound for this market is 50,000 ETH and the upper bound is 250,000 ETH.

The resolution source for this market will be https://etherchain.org/burn, under “Total burned.” The resolution source will be checked at exactly September 5, 2021, 12:00 PM ET. If data is not available on the webpage at that time, another credible source will be chosen by the MIC to resolve the market. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

You can use the calculator to the right (underneath the Buy modal) to calculate how each Long or Short Token price corresponds with ETH burned. Long and Short shares will settle proportionally to the outcome value if the final value is between these bounds, but if the final value exceeds either the upper or lower bound, the price of each Outcome Token is capped at $1 and $0. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).
